responsibilities: Collaborate with leadership and senior engineers to build the technical roadmap for the Consumer Revenue team.
Focus on accelerating growth of existing revenue streams and developing new monetization opportunities.
Collaborate with staff engineers and partners to ensure technical alignment with other systems and products.
Use technical expertise to improve team performance and achieve high technical standards.
Partner with Product, Design, Marketing, Partnerships, and Customer Success to launch new revenue initiatives.
Advise leadership on technical considerations for engineering excellence and key initiatives.
Partner with leadership on strategic planning and improve systems and processes.
Provide technical leadership, mentor junior engineers, and foster a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.
skills: Solid understanding of development frameworks and fundamentals for web, Android, iOS, and backend platforms.
Experience leading large initiatives from inception to launch.
Experience building and shipping product features at large scale or in real-time applications.
Ability to collaborate closely with cross-functional peers and express opinions to create great products.
Holistic approach to problem-solving, focusing on first principles.
qualifications: 8+ years of industry experience as a software engineer.
Experience with web (React, TypeScript), Android (React Native, Kotlin), iOS (React Native, Objective-C, Swift), and backend (Python and some Elixir) platforms.
Experience leading large initiatives and building product features.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and solve problems holistically.
